detaileddescription.para: Utility function to split a string into a vector of strings, using a delimiter. This function is used by parse_survey_ranges() to interpret the surveyranges parameter.

parameterdescription.para: The delimiter to use to split the string.

detaileddescription.para: This function parses the ranges in the surveyranges parameter. It takes a string like "q2:1-48,q4:1-36" and returns a vector of integers like [1, 48, 1, 36]

parameterdescription.para: a string that looks like this: q2:1-48,q4:1-48
